allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
chore: initial project configuration and tooling setup

- Add package.json with React 19, TypeScript 5.8, Vite 6.2
- Configure ESLint with TypeScript and React plugins
- Configure Prettier for consistent code formatting
- Set up Tailwind CSS 3.4 with PostCSS
- Configure Vitest with React Testing Library
- Enable TypeScript strict mode with path aliases
- Add .env.example template for environment variables

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
